column1: The Seven Years' War was a world war fought between 1754 and 1763
column2: the main conflict occurring in the seven-year period from 1756 to 1763. It involved every European great power of the time except the Ottoman Empire
column8: and the Philippines. The conflict split Europe into two coalitions
column9: led by Great Britain on one side and France on the other. For the first time
